channel.title: Yeah,...um...I went on a Korean Serious RP server (black mesa)
channel.description:
It was a pain in the ass the get thru the motd menu and set ur name. The first thing I've seen was this cue/line of scientists. At first i thought they were all bots, but I was wrong. They are disciplined serious roleplay players. .... Then I get perm baned for speaking english I guess... :slight_smile:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EVx0-HqgZOU[/url]
